description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Microsoft Windows SCSI class system file elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-21434):

1. Download the relevant update package(s) from the Microsoft Update Catalog:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2 (x64-based Systems): [KB5035853](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035853)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2 (x64-based Systems): [KB5035853](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035853)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2 (x64-based Systems): [KB5035854](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035854)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 (x64-based Systems): [KB5035845](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035845)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2 (x64-based Systems): [KB5035845](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035845)

2. Install the download(s) as per the standard installation procedures in your environment.
3. Restart your system to ensure all updates take effect.

**Details**:
- This update resolves an important elevation of privilege vulnerability in the SCSI class system file. 
- You should ensure that your system is updated to the corresponding build numbers associated with each version listed.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation of updates.

**Build Numbers**:
- Windows 11 Version 23H2: 10.0.22631.3296
- Windows 10 Version 22H2: 10.0.19045.4170

**KB Article IDs**:
- Ensure you reference the updated KB articles for additional details on the vulnerabilities addressed.
